download.title: Download
download.iso_verification_content: Once you have downloaded a <1>tau<2>OS</2></1> image, make sure to verify it for security and integrity.
download.respins_content: If these aren’t what you need, other downloads including Respins, Torrents, and alternate architectures are available.

alt_download.title: Alternative Downloads
alt_download.forward_content: Tau Forward is the name given to the current development versions of tauOS. It is primarily meant for advanced users, testers and package maintainers. Learn more at
